snippet.title: Shuyan Saga - Trailer 1 (ENG)
snippet.description:
Shuyan Saga is a Wuxia action graphic novel with a full 3D combat system and choice mechanics that let you help shape the story.

Coming soon to PC, iOS, and Android; with other platforms TBA.

Website: http://www.shuyansaga.com/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/shuyansaga
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/shuyansaga/
